Instructions to get started

1) Fill out the agent application online Agent Application

2)  Download the contract, sign it, then fax back to 801 972-6973  Download contract

3) Download LOA

The next step, Sell it, Here's how.
(with the tools you are given the service will sell itself)

Once you have registered, you will have your own ONLINE-CSR web site with your information on it.  (www.online-csr.com/agent_name)

1) After you submit your online Agent Application you will be notified within 48 hours that your account has been set up.  You will be given the URL to your custom ONLINE-CSR web site.

2) Have a customer visit your ONLINE-CSR web site, and view the demonstration.  You have the option of showing your pricing for the service or you can have your customer contact you directly for pricing.

3) You can have your customer sign up for the service online by following the simple instructions or you can sign your customer up yourself. (A signed LOA must be submitted for each customer, your agency's name should be on the LOA)

4) Within 5 business days your customer will be set up.  Either you or you and the customer will be notified when the customers records can be viewed online.

5) When the customers ONLINE-CSR service has been set up, be sure and have the customer edit or specify the location name, department and division for each CSR.  You and the customer will be able to see which if any CSR's have problems when you see a red check.

6) Follow up to see that any and all corrections have been made. (check online)

OUR GUARANTEE
We know that this is a valuable service for customers that have multiple CSR's.  The larger the customer the more valuable the service. Therefore we will offer this guarantee. Any customer may cancel their ONLINE-CSR service in the first 10 days and they will not be billed.  This guarantee is extended to all agents. If ONLINE-CSR feels that this guarantee is being abused by any agent the guarantee will be rescinded for that agent.
 

We appreciate your feedback FEEDBACK
